title: Swift Campout Returns for 2025
content:
Mark your calendars and pack your bicycle bags — Swift Campout launches today for its 11th edition on June 21–22, 2025, inviting cyclists worldwide to celebrate the summer solstice with a weekend of camping under the stars. What began as a grassroots idea from Seattle-based bicycle bag brand Swift Industries has grown into an international phenomenon, inspiring thousands of riders from all over the world with one shared purpose: to get outside, slow down, and kick off summer with a bikepacking trip.

See more at Swift Campout.

The post Swift Campout Returns for 2025 appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
